hints.content:
Bugs collected $\greenD{36}$ carrots.  How many pictures are above Bugs on the picture graph?

[[☃ image 1]]

$\blueD6$ pictures are above Bugs.  

$\blueD6 \times \,\maroonD{?} = \greenD{36}$

options.alt: A picture graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Rabbits and the vertical axis labeled Number of carrots collected. Each rabbit is listed along the horizontal axis from left to right as follows: Bugs, Cottontail, Flopsy, and Babs. The number of carrots collected is represented by the number of pictures of carrots plotted on the graph. Bugs is represented by 6 pictures of carrots, Cottontail is represented by 4 pictures of carrots, Flopsy is represented by 3 pictures of carrots, and Babs is represented by 5 pictures of carrots. 6 pictures of carrots above Bugs are labeled from 1 at the bottom to 6 at the top. !

hints.content:
$\blueD6 \times \maroonD{6} = \greenD{36}$

Let's see if $\maroonD{6}$ works for the other rabbits.

Rabbit  || Number of carrots collected 
:- | :-: | :-: 
Bugs| $\blueD6  \times \maroonD{6} = \greenD{36}$| $\greenD{36}$ 
Cottontail |$4  \times \maroonD{6} = \greenD{24}$| $\greenD{24}$ 
Flopsy| $3  \times \maroonD{6} = \greenD{18}$| $\greenD{18}$ 
Babs| $5  \times \maroonD{6} = \greenD{30}$| $\greenD{30}$

On the picture graph, each

[[☃ image 1]]

equals $\maroonD{6}$ carrots.

question.content:
Babs Bunny and her rabbit friends love to collect carrots! They created a chart and a picture graph to show how many carrots each of them collected this week.

Rabbit  | Number of carrots collected 
:- | :-: 
Bugs | $36$ 
Cottontail | $24$ 
Flopsy | $18$ 
Babs | $30$ 

[[☃ image 1]]

[[☃ image 2]]


**On the picture graph, each**

[[☃ image 3]]

**equals [[☃ input-number 2]] carrots.**

options.alt: A picture of a carrot equals question mark carrots. !

A picture graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Rabbits and the vertical axis labeled Number of carrots collected. Each rabbit is listed along the horizontal axis from left to right as follows: Bugs, Cottontail, Flopsy, and Babs. The number of carrots collected is represented by the number of pictures of carrots plotted on the graph. Bugs is represented by 6 pictures of carrots, Cottontail is represented by 4 pictures of carrots, Flopsy is represented by 3 pictures of carrots, and Babs is represented by 5 pictures of carrots. !
